org.openimaj.vis.general

Class BarVisualisation3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.vis.Visualisation3D<double[][]>
      • org.openimaj.vis.general.BarVisualisation3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.media.opengl.GLEventListener, AnimatedVisualisationProvider, Visualisation<double[][]>, VisualisationImageProvider

    public class BarVisualisation3D
extends Visualisation3D<double[][]>
    Plots oneOverDataLength bars in oneOverDataLength 3-dimensional space, which means there are 2 dimensions for representing the coordinate of oneOverDataLength bar.
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
